name: Last Will and Testament
description: A legal document that expresses a person's wishes for the distribution of their assets and the care of any minor children after death

sections.title: LAST WILL AND TESTAMENT
sections.content: I, {testator_name}, residing at {testator_address}, being of sound mind and memory, do hereby make, publish, and declare this to be my Last Will and Testament, hereby revoking all wills and codicils previously made by me.

sections.title: 2. PERSONAL INFORMATION
sections.content: I declare that I am {marital_status}. I have the following children: {children_names}.

sections.title: 3. EXECUTOR APPOINTMENT
sections.content: I hereby appoint {executor_name}, residing at {executor_address}, as the Executor of this Will. If {executor_name} is unable or unwilling to serve, I appoint {alternate_executor_name} as the successor Executor.

sections.title: 4. GUARDIAN APPOINTMENT
sections.content: If at the time of my death I have any minor children, I appoint {guardian_name} as guardian of the person and property of such minor children.

sections.title: 5. SPECIFIC BEQUESTS
sections.content: I make the following specific bequests: {specific_bequests}

sections.title: 6. RESIDUARY ESTATE
sections.content: I give, devise, and bequeath all the rest, residue, and remainder of my estate to: {residuary_beneficiaries}

sections.title: 7. DIGITAL ASSETS
sections.content: With respect to my digital assets, I direct the following: {digital_assets}

sections.title: 8. PETS
sections.content: With respect to any pets I may own at the time of my death, I direct the following: {pets_arrangements}

sections.title: 10. BURIAL WISHES
sections.content: My wishes regarding funeral and burial arrangements are as follows: {burial_wishes}

sections.title: 11. ATTESTATION
sections.content: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand to this my Last Will and Testament on this {date}.
